      double contagionProbability​(Person p)
      this method calculate the probability the given person will be infected from this virus
      Parameters:
      p - : the person that we want to calculate his probability to get sick
      Returns:
      the probability the given person will be infected from this virus

    • tryToContagion

      boolean tryToContagion​(Person a, Person b)
      this method check if the first person (param a) can contagion the second person (param b) (if not already sick) by calculate tryToContagionEquation
      Parameters:
      a - the Sick person who try to contagion the second person
      b - the person who might be contagion
      Returns:
      True if the person b contracted the virus

    • tryToKill

      boolean tryToKill​(Sick s)
      this method calculate the probability if the given person will die by calculate see tryToKillEquation
      Parameters:
      s - the Sick person who might die
      Returns:
      True if the person died other wise false
